TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EfxAuxiliaryf extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: A list of valid 32-Bits Float AuxiliaryEffectSlot/GetAuxiliaryEffectSlot parameters

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxAuxiliaryf EffectslotGain = int32(2)

Docs.summary: This property is used to specify an output level for the Auxiliary Effect Slot. Setting the gain to 0.0f mutes the output. Range [0.0f .. 1.0f] Default: 1.0f
